casebody.data:
State
v.
Calvin Renard Carter. 193P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 24, 2016

Mr. Richard J. Costanza, Southern Pines, Attorney at Law, For Carter, Calvin Renard.

Ms. Kristin Jo Uicker, Attorney at Law, Mr. James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of May 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of May 2016."
